name: Loving the Rams! This game has me amped for the season. 😎🐏🏈

summary: @cleverdevil Eveyone in LA should cheer on the Rams and let the Chargers languish. As a bitter San Diegan I hope that move turns out to be the worst in football history.

content.html: @cleverdevil Eveyone in LA should cheer on the Rams and let the Chargers languish. As a bitter San Diegan I hope that move turns out to be the worst in football history.

summary: @zoglesby no one really wanted them here in LA! If the Rams keep winning, I think the Chargers are going to have a hard time getting any traction. That said, I’m delighted to have football back in LA.
